attributes.action: only force minimum wage upon employers when the employee has worked for a month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By doing this, it will ensure that there is equality between employees of all ages
For example if a 16 year old and an 18 year old, with the same crudencials, were starting the same job on minimum wage the 18 year old would earn more for doing the same work. Is this fair?
